page.title: 07Tiverton's News Services
page.content: The people of Tiverton have a number of ways of knowing what is going on around them. There is the local newspaper called the "Tiverton Gazette". This comes out every Tuesday and contains all sorts of stories about town and country life. There is also a free newspaper called the "Mid Devon Star" which has lots of advertising as well as news. It is delivered to every home in Tiverton. Sometimes events are advertised by displays in the window of the "Western Counties Building Society". Sometimes people can even arrange for a banner to be stretched out across the main road near the Town Hall. Of course we also hear Devon's news on "BBC Radio Devon" and "Devonair" as well as watching television. Most important news is still passed on mainly by talking to our friends.
